name:
6-Month Subscription
[ 12 Cards ]
description: This is a 6-month subscription to letterpress joy! Over the 6 months, you will receive a total of 12 cards with matching envelopes. 2 custom-designed cards {2 variations of 1 design} will be sent to you every month. All orders will be shipped on the 1st of the month. Please note: these card photos are examples of some TOTA Press designs - and do not reflect the cards the subscriber will be receiving. Shipping Domestic and international orders to all countries are welcome. Domestic shipments are packaged in recycled cardboard rigid mailers; International shipments are packaged in USPS rigid mailers {this helps us keep shipping costs down for int'l destinations!}. Domestic shipping is $3 per month (total for 6 months = $18). International shipping is $4.50 per month (total for 6 months = $27). Note: 1 shipping address per order only. Is this a gift? For gift subscriptions, please notify us in the Note to seller box in PayPal - in the payment process. Enter the gift recipient's mailing address for Shipping address in PayPal. You can also write a personal gift message to the recipient in the Gift options box and we will be sure to include that too. If you do not include a personal message, the default message is: "You have received a gift subscription from [your full name]!" Gift subscription recipients will be notified by mail: when they will receive their first order and for how long, what TOTA Press is, and your gift message. For any special requests or situations, please contact us before placing your order.

name:
3-Month Subscription
[ 6 Cards ]
description: This is a 3-month subscription to letterpress goodness. Over the 3 months, you will receive a total of 6 cards with matching envelopes. 2 handmade cards {2 variations of 1 unique design} will be sent to you every month. All orders will be shipped on the 1st of the month. Please note: these card photos are examples of some TOTA Press designs - and do not reflect the cards the subscriber will be receiving. Shipping Domestic and international orders to all countries are welcome. Domestic shipments are packaged in recycled cardboard rigid mailers; International shipments are packaged in USPS rigid mailers {this helps us keep shipping costs down for int'l destinations!}. Domestic shipping is $10 for all 3 months; International shipping is $14 for all 3 months. Note: 1 shipping address per order only. Is this a gift? For gift subscriptions, please notify us in the Note to seller box in PayPal - in the payment process. Enter the gift recipient's mailing address for Shipping address in PayPal. You can also write a personal gift message to the recipient in the Gift options box and we will be sure to include that too. If you do not include a personal message, the default message is: "You have received a gift subscription from [your full name]!" Gift subscription recipients will be notified by mail: when they will receive their first order and for how long, what TOTA Press is, and your gift message. For any special requests or situations, please contact us before placing your order.

name: 1-Month Mailing [ 2 Cards ]
description: This is a little opportunity to get an idea of what a TOTA Press subscription is all about. You will receive 2 standard-sized cards with matching envelopes. 2 custom-designed cards {2 variations of 1 design} will be shipped to you on the 1st of the next month. Please note: these card photos are examples of some TOTA Press designs - and do not reflect the cards the subscriber will be receiving. Shipping Domestic and international orders to all countries are welcome. Domestic shipments are packaged in recycled cardboard rigid mailers; International shipments are packaged in USPS rigid mailers {this helps us keep shipping costs down for int'l destinations!}. Domestic shipping is $3.50. International shipping is $5.00. Note: 1 shipping address per order only. Is this a gift? For gift subscriptions, please notify us in the Note to seller box in PayPal - in the payment process. Enter the gift recipient's mailing address for Shipping address in PayPal. You can also write a personal gift message to the recipient in the Gift options box and we will be sure to include that too. If you do not include a personal message, the default message is: "You have received a gift subscription from [your full name]!" Gift subscription recipients will be notified by mail: when they will receive their first order and for how long, what TOTA Press is, and your gift message. For any special requests or situations, please contact us before placing your order.

name: kiku {colors}
description:
Blank folded greeting card with kiku chrysanthemums in jewel tones of teal and purple, plus some grays.

Card is printed on 100% cotton Lettra pearl white paper.
A2 card {4.25 x 5.5 inches} with matching-size envelope.

Domestic shipments are packaged in recycled cardboard rigid mailers; International shipments are packaged in USPS rigid mailers {this helps us keep shipping costs down for int'l destinations!}. 
Note: 1 shipping address per order please.
